song.title: Unashamed
song.lyrics:
[1] . G2 Asus4 Bm7 I have not much to offer You . G2 Asus4 Bm7 Not near what You deserve || . G2 Asus4 Bm7 But still I come because Your cross . G2 Asus4 D Has placed in me my
[C] . G2 Asus4 And I know I’m weak . Bm7 I know I’m unworthy . G2 Asus4 Bm7 To call upon your name || . G2 Asus4 But because of grace . Bm7 Because of Your mercy . G2 Asus4 D I stand here unashamed ---
[2] Oh Christ my king of sympathy Who’s wounds secure at peace || Your grace extends to call me friend Your mercy sets me free
[3] I can’t explain this kind of love I’m humbled and amazed || That you come down from heaven’s heights And greet me face to face
[INSTRUMENTAL] .D G A G
[B] . D Here I am . G2 At your feet . Asus4 G2 In my brokenness complete
